% Requirement box (ID + priority)
\newtcolorbox{reqbox}[3]{title=\sffamily\bfseries #1 \hfill \sffamily #2, colback=LSGray, colframe=LSBlue!45}
% #1 = ID, #2 = Priority, #3 = (unused placeholder to allow future extensions)
